players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Who voted to kill Bob last night? We need to know who had motive or opportunity."
Diana: "I can't believe Bob is gone. This is horrible. I didn't vote to kill him — I voted for Charlie."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night — she's the mafioso."
You: "I don't trust Charlie's claim without proof. Diana says she voted for Charlie — can anyone confirm their vote? If Charlie really investigated Diana, why didn't he share details (when, how)?"
Diana: "I didn't vote for Bob — I voted for Charlie like I said. Charlie's claim smells like a push to pin suspicion on me; he gave no investigator details. Alice, why are you defending him so hard?"
Charlie: "I checked Diana during Night 1 and my investigator result shows mafia. Bob is dead—Diana had motive. Diana's claims about voting don't matter; we need to arrest the confirmed mafioso now."
